data.title: Aurigny
data.meta_description: Define Aurigny. Aurigny synonyms, Aurigny pronunciation, Aurigny translation, English dictionary definition of Aurigny. A British island in the English Channel. The northernmost of the larger Channel Islands, it is separated from the French coast by a swift channel, the Race...

| January 28 Sala's family, including his mother Mercedes and sister Romina, take a chartered flight in a plane operated by Guernsey airline Aurigny over the area where the plane disappeared.

January 28: SALA'S family, including his mother Mercedes and sister Romina, take a chartered flight in a plane operated by Guernsey airline Aurigny over the area where the plane disappeared.

The "scenic flight" circled the island of Alderney, according to Aurigny, an airline that operates in the Channel Islands.

Local airline Aurigny, who flew the family, confirmed: "We operated a commercial scenic flight service this morning out of Guernsey which flew to the west of Alderney and around Alderney before returning to Guernsey."

His relatives and friends, including his mother Mercedes and sister Romina, travelled in a plane operated by Guernsey airline Aurigny.
